function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid escalation of interventions by European governments","Impact":"Potential for sudden and disruptive changes in policy and public behavior","Mitigation":"Early and transparent communication of government intentions and contingency plans","Technologies":"Communication platforms for rapid dissemination of information","People":"General public, businesses, and healthcare systems","Owner":"Government authorities and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Inaccurate model predictions leading to ineffective interventions","Impact":"Wasted resources and lack of control over disease propagation","Mitigation":"Regular validation and updating of model parameters with real-world data","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, and data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Incomplete or biased data used for modeling","Impact":"Misleading analysis and flawed decision-making","Mitigation":"Implement strict data quality controls and diversify data sources","Technologies":"Data validation and integration tools","People":"Data collectors, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies and research institutions"}]}
